DBTransactionInfo

public DBTransactionInfo(int theConnectId,
                         int theFlag,
                         int theLockCount,
                         java.lang.String theName,
                         java.lang.String theTransId)
Creates a new, empty DBTransactionInfo object with the specified parameters.

Parameters:
theConnectId - The id for a connection held by the transaction.
theFlag - Additional info associated with the transaction, for example, whether the transaction is a long or short transaction.
theLockCount - The number of locks held in the transaction.
theName - The transaction name.
theTransId - The unique id for the transaction.
